pullRequest.title: Add AmberScript Transcription Service
pullRequest.bodyText:
Adds service to generate transcriptions using the services of AmberScript. For testing this you need an API key which you can obtain by contacting AmberScript. I based the code on other transcription services already in opencast codebase. See included docs for help to configure the service.
If you want to use this service with older opencast versions there are precompiled jars available at https://opencast.plapadoo.com/amberscript/. These jar files work when loading the via the deploy directory. Sources are available on our opencast fork at https://github.com/plapadoo/opencast/branches.
This work is sponsored by AmberScript.

nodes.bodyText: What is the jobtype for? It will be useful in the documentation to define what it is or what it does.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,15 @@
+# AmberScript Start Transcription
+
+## Description
+
+AmberScript Start Transcription invokes the AmberScript Transcription Service by submitting
+an audio or video file to be transcribed and captioned.
+
+## Parameter Table
+
+| configuration keys    | description                                                              | default      | example            |
+|-----------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------|--------------------|
+| source-tag            | A tag selecting the audio or video file to be sent for translation.      | transcript   | engage-download    |
+| jobtype               | direct or perfect                                                        | direct       | perfect            |

@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+# Set true to enable AmberScript Transcription Service
+# Default: false
+# enabled=false
+
+# Defailt Language to be used transcribing.

@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+# Set true to enable AmberScript Transcription Service
+# Default: false
+# enabled=false
+
+# Defailt Language to be used transcribing.
+# You can override this within you workflow (see workflowoperationhandler amberscript-start-transcription).
+# Default: en
+# Can bet one: nl, en, de, fr, da, sv, fi, no, es

@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+# Set true to enable AmberScript Transcription Service
+# Default: false
+# enabled=false
+
+# Defailt Language to be used transcribing.
+# You can override this within you workflow (see workflowoperationhandler amberscript-start-transcription).
+# Default: en
+# Can bet one: nl, en, de, fr, da, sv, fi, no, es
+# language=en
+
+# Default Job Type to use
+# You can override this within you workflow (see workflowoperationhandler amberscript-start-transcription).
+# Default: direct
+# Can bet one: perfect, direct

nodes.bodyText: Xml file formated differently compared to other xml files in the same application

commit.message:
review findings

- improve docs
- fix typos
- remove empty test
- fix xml formatting
increase max job duration to accomodate long running jobs
